TopicTitle: Tourist wants suboribal flight around the sun

Articles.Content: Does this mean what I think it means? Like 24k delta-V to get into a collision course into the sun and then speed back and land on kerbin again. It just seems a bit extreme to get into a suborbital course on the sun.
Ha! What a nutcase. Is there an option to have them committed instead? How much are they willing to pay for such a thrill?
A whopping 200k funds. I could probably build a rocket that crashes into the sun for those funds, but he wants to get back again, so...
You don't need to crash. As soon as you lower the Pe under the surface you've achieved suborbital, and you'll still be at apoapsis, so, just turn around and burn prograde to save the poor moron.

Greetings!

I also had a Touristgroup that wanted stuff like this. I couldn't believe it so I took a screenshot. Glad to hear my tourists are not alone with their insanity^^
